info.official_title: A Phase I Study Evaluating the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics, and Preliminary Efficacy of SYH2051 Monotherapy in Patients With Advanced Solid Tumors or in Combination With Radiotherapy in Patients With Locally Advanced Head and Neck Cancer

identified_line.line: 1. Age ≥18 years old, male or female;

2. Phase Ia: Patients with histologically or cytologically confirmed advanced solid tumors, for whom there is no standard therapy available, or ineffective or intolerant to standard therapy. Phase Ib/Ic: Patients with histologically or cytologically confirmed locally advanced head and neck cancer suitable for radiotherapy alone;

criterions.exact_snippets: Phase Ia: Patients with histologically or cytologically confirmed advanced solid tumors
Phase Ia: ... for whom there is no standard therapy available
Phase Ia: ... ineffective or intolerant to standard therapy
Phase Ib/Ic: Patients with histologically or cytologically confirmed locally advanced head and neck cancer
criterions.criterion: locally advanced head and neck cancer

criterions.exact_snippets: Phase Ib/Ic: ... suitable for radiotherapy alone

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Phase Ia: Patients with histologically or cytologically confirmed advanced solid tumors

or_criteria.exact_snippets: Phase Ia: ... for whom there is no standard therapy available
Phase Ia: ... ineffective or intolerant to standard therapy

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Phase Ib/Ic: Patients with histologically or cytologically confirmed locally advanced head and neck cancer
and_criteria.criterion: locally advanced head and neck cancer

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Phase Ib/Ic: ... suitable for radiotherapy alone

identified_line.line: 3. Eastern Collaborative Oncology Group (ECOG) Performance Status of 0~1;

criterions.exact_snippets: Eastern Collaborative Oncology Group (ECOG) Performance Status of 0~1

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Eastern Collaborative Oncology Group (ECOG) Performance Status of 0~1

identified_line.line: 4. Patients in medical conditions to be able to receive radiotherapy (for phase Ib/Ic);

criterions.exact_snippets: Patients in medical conditions to be able to receive radiotherapy

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Patients in medical conditions to be able to receive radiotherapy

identified_line.line: 5. Life expectancy of >3 months;
7. Patients with adequate hematologic, hepatic, renal and coagulation function;
8. Patients are not pregnant or lactating and required contraception;
9. Patients who are willing to provide written informed consent form (ICF) before the beginning of the study.

criterions.exact_snippets: willing to provide written informed consent form (ICF)

and_criteria.exact_snippets: willing to provide written informed consent form (ICF)

identified_line.line: Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years

1. Any antineoplastic therapy such as chemotherapy, biologic therapy, endocrine therapy, or immunotherapy within 4 weeks before the first dose of the study drug (or within 5 half-lives of other unmarketed study drugs, whichever is longer), except for the following:

criterions.exact_snippets: Any antineoplastic therapy such as chemotherapy, biologic therapy, endocrine therapy, or immunotherapy within 4 weeks before the first dose of the study drug
(or within 5 half-lives of other unmarketed study drugs, whichever is longer)

requirement.expected_value: within 5 half-lives of other unmarketed study drugs, whichever is longer

or_criteria.exact_snippets: Any antineoplastic therapy such as chemotherapy, biologic therapy, endocrine therapy, or immunotherapy within 4 weeks before the first dose of the study drug
(or within 5 half-lives of other unmarketed study drugs, whichever is longer)

requirement.expected_value: within 5 half-lives of other unmarketed study drugs, whichever is longer

identified_line.line: 1. 6 weeks for Nitrosoureas or mitomycin C;

or_criteria.exact_snippets: 6 weeks for Nitrosoureas
6 weeks for ... mitomycin C

identified_line.line: 3. 2 weeks for Chinese herbal medicine with antineoplastic indications;

criterions.exact_snippets: 2 weeks for Chinese herbal medicine with antineoplastic indications
criterions.criterion: Chinese herbal medicine with antineoplastic indications

not_criteria.exact_snippets: 2 weeks for Chinese herbal medicine with antineoplastic indications
not_criteria.criterion: Chinese herbal medicine with antineoplastic indications

identified_line.line: 2. Patients with previous (within 2 years before screening) or concurrent other malignancies (only for phase Ib/Ic);

criterions.exact_snippets: previous (within 2 years before screening) or concurrent other malignancies
previous (within 2 years before screening) or concurrent other malignancies

or_criteria.exact_snippets: previous (within 2 years before screening) or concurrent other malignancies
previous (within 2 years before screening) or concurrent other malignancies

identified_line.line: 3. Patients had undergone major organ surgery (excluding needle biopsies) within 4 weeks before the first dose, with obvious trauma, or require elective surgery during the study;

criterions.exact_snippets: Patients had undergone major organ surgery (excluding needle biopsies) within 4 weeks before the first dose
require elective surgery during the study

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Patients had undergone major organ surgery (excluding needle biopsies) within 4 weeks before the first dose

or_criteria.exact_snippets: require elective surgery during the study

identified_line.line: 4. Severe, non-healing fractures within 4 weeks before the first dose of the study drug;

criterions.exact_snippets: within 4 weeks before the first dose of the study drug

and_criteria.exact_snippets: within 4 weeks before the first dose of the study drug

identified_line.line: 11. History of myopathy or raised creatine kinase (CK) >5 times the upper limit of normal (ULN);

criterions.exact_snippets: raised creatine kinase (CK) >5 times the upper limit of normal (ULN)

expected_value.unit: times the upper limit of normal (ULN)

or_criteria.exact_snippets: History of myopathy
raised creatine kinase (CK) >5 times the upper limit of normal (ULN)

expected_value.unit: times the upper limit of normal (ULN)

identified_line.line: 12. Known hypersensitivity or intolerance to any component of the study drug or its excipients;

criterions.exact_snippets: Known hypersensitivity or intolerance to any component of the study drug or its excipients

not_criteria.exact_snippets: Known hypersensitivity or intolerance to any component of the study drug or its excipients

identified_line.line: 13. History of autoimmune disease, immunodeficiency disease, including HIV testing positive or other acquired, congenital immunodeficiency diseases, or organ transplantation;

or_criteria.exact_snippets: HIV testing positive
acquired, congenital immunodeficiency diseases
organ transplantation

identified_line.line: 14. Active hepatitis B virus, hepatitis C virus or active syphilis infection;

or_criteria.exact_snippets: Active hepatitis B virus
hepatitis C virus
active syphilis infection

identified_line.line: 15. Active dysphagia, malabsorption or other chronic gastrointestinal diseases or conditions that may hamper compliance and/or absorption of the study drug;

or_criteria.exact_snippets: malabsorption
chronic gastrointestinal diseases or conditions

identified_line.line: 16. Other ineligibilities according to the investigator.

criterions.exact_snippets: Other ineligibilities according to the investigator.

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Other ineligibilities according to the investigator.

identified_line.line: 5. The adverse reactions of previous antineoplastic therapy have not recovered to ≤grade 1 as determined by Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events (CTCAE) v5.0 criteria;

criterions.exact_snippets: adverse reactions of previous antineoplastic therapy have not recovered to ≤grade 1 ... CTCAE v5.0 criteria
criterions.criterion: recovery from adverse reactions of previous antineoplastic therapy

not_criteria.exact_snippets: adverse reactions of previous antineoplastic therapy have not recovered to ≤grade 1 ... CTCAE v5.0 criteria
not_criteria.criterion: recovery from adverse reactions of previous antineoplastic therapy

identified_line.line: 6. At least one measurable lesion (excluding patients in phase Ic combined with adjuvant radiotherapy);

criterions.exact_snippets: excluding patients in phase Ic combined with adjuvant radiotherapy
criterions.criterion: phase Ic combined with adjuvant radiotherapy

not_criteria.exact_snippets: excluding patients in phase Ic combined with adjuvant radiotherapy
not_criteria.criterion: phase Ic combined with adjuvant radiotherapy

identified_line.line: 2. 2 weeks or five half-lives (whichever is longer) for oral fluorouracil and small molecule targeted drugs;

criterions.exact_snippets: 2 weeks or five half-lives (whichever is longer) for oral fluorouracil

requirement.expected_value: 2 weeks or five half-lives (whichever is longer)

criterions.exact_snippets: 2 weeks or five half-lives (whichever is longer) for ... small molecule targeted drugs
criterions.criterion: small molecule targeted drugs washout period

requirement.expected_value: 2 weeks or five half-lives (whichever is longer)

or_criteria.exact_snippets: 2 weeks or five half-lives (whichever is longer) for oral fluorouracil
2 weeks or five half-lives (whichever is longer) for oral fluorouracil
2 weeks or five half-lives (whichever is longer) for ... small molecule targeted drugs
or_criteria.criterion: small molecule targeted drugs washout period

or_criteria.exact_snippets: 2 weeks or five half-lives (whichever is longer) for ... small molecule targeted drugs
or_criteria.criterion: small molecule targeted drugs washout period

identified_line.line: 6. Patients who had received treatment with any drug that is a medium or strong inhibitor or inducer of cytochrome P450 (CYP) 3A4/5 enzyme activity within 2 weeks before screening or need to continue receiving such drugs;

criterions.exact_snippets: received treatment with any drug that is a medium or strong inhibitor or inducer of cytochrome P450 (CYP) 3A4/5 enzyme activity within 2 weeks before screening
criterions.criterion: treatment with CYP3A4/5 enzyme activity inhibitors or inducers

criterions.exact_snippets: need to continue receiving such drugs
criterions.criterion: need to continue receiving CYP3A4/5 enzyme activity inhibitors or inducers

identified_line.line: 7. Active brain metastases and/or carcinomatous meningitis;
8. Concurrent serious and/or uncontrolled medical conditions at screening (e.g., severe chronic obstructive pulmonary disease);

criterions.exact_snippets: Concurrent serious and/or uncontrolled medical conditions
Concurrent serious and/or uncontrolled medical conditions

identified_line.line: 9. Patients with abnormal thyroid function were not allowed, except those with euthyroid function after drug control;
10. History of severe cardiovascular disease;
